nodes.text: Dex's Double was a type of burger sold between 19 BBY and 0 BBY at Dex's Diner, an eatery maintained by a Besalisk cook named Dexter Jettster, located in the CoCo District of the Galactic Core planet Coruscant. At one point, a promotion sign stated that a Dex's Double would come for free with any purchase, although it was not guaranteed whether it would be fully cooked, made of actual meat, free of parasites, or even free in the first place.
Dex's Double was first mentioned in a Facebook post on August 2012 authored by the Star Wars Detours page, an upcoming non-canon animated television series scheduled to begin airing in 2013.
